long_description: Designed to get wet and stay warm, the Roxy Waveline Spring Wetsuit offers stylish lightweight insulation when you're paddleboarding, kayaking, surfing and otherwise playing in the water. Stretchy, 2mm-thick neoprene with a smooth inner and outer lining guards your body heat against chilly wind and spray. Clean finished seams at the neck and zipper create a smooth look and feel. Zippered pocket at back securely stores your keys and sunscreen. Hidden thumbholes offer extra coverage. Hand wash the Roxy Waveline Spring Wetsuit in cold water and lay flat to dry.
short_description: Designed to get wet and stay warm, the Roxy Waveline Spring Wetsuit offers stylish lightweight insulation when you're paddleboarding, kayaking, surfing and otherwise playing in the water.
